property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ixidor had only to imagine their ruin and Akroma made it so.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing." - Song of All, canto 642

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.) When Kor Sanctifiers enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why keep such trinkets? They only add weight to your travels."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent. When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, it deals damage equal to that permanent's mana value to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may attach Prison Term to that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying Broodstar's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The secret to invention is to see something in your mind, then find where it hides in the world."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see their moral dilemmas. I see their raw courage. I see their self-sacrifice. I see our victory."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control. Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the clouds bend themselves to Memnarch's will, eager to swallow those who oppose him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Sarcomite Myr gains flying until end of turn. {2}, Sacrifice Sarcomite Myr: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A horrible sight, yes, but the sounds . . . Its twanging tendons and grinding gears are almost musical." - Brudiclad, Telchor engineer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lymph, the fluid essence of blinkmoths, is prized by wizards for the rush of intellect it provides.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Art is unknown to the vedalken - for them, all creations must serve a purpose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent had two or more creatures enter the battlefield under their control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Other black creatures get +1/+1. Nonblack creatures get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His soul snared by an angel's curse, Crovax twisted heroism into its purest shadow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({2B} can be paid with any two mana or with {B}. This card's mana value is 6.) Search your library for a card with mana value less than or equal to the number of lands you control, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who hear her go mad with inspiration.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flanking +lt;I+gt;(Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)+lt;/I+gt; {1}{B}{B}: Regenerate Cadaverous Knight.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grieve for the soul in death dishonored. - Shadow Guild saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spend only black mana on X. Consume Spirit deals X damage to any target and you gain X life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a Zombie card and a Swamp card, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few Cabal fighters fear death. They fear what follows it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there is such a thing as too much power, I have not discovered it." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skeletons you control and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In life, it was a fetid, disease-ridden thing. In death, not much changed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bonds of loyalty can tie one to the grave." - Crovax, ascendant evincar

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oddly, no one questioned the Cabal's wisdom in hiring a zombie to work at the cemetery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, untap Helldozer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes you go to hell, and sometimes hell comes to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize." - Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, two -1/-1 counters on another target creature, and three -1/-1 counters on a third target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shadowmoor's main crops are rot, slime, and despair.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Nefashu attacks, up to five target creatures each get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the nefashu pass, blood rolls like a silk carpet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Noxious Ghoul or another Zombie enters the battlefield, all non-Zombie creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Plague and death wrapped in one convenient package.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A drop of humanity for a sea of power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Target player loses X life. • Return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. • Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. • Up to X target creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rotting Rats enters the battlefield, each player discards a card. Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Each player loses 1 life for each Zombie on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My priests swore loyalty to the Cabal not until death, but beyond it." - Cabal Patriarch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soulless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield plus the number of Zombie cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Phage drank their energy, a vague memory of Jeska stirred. Then she lost herself again in the joy of her victims' suffering.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Zombie spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Zombie creatures you control get +2/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has the strength of seven men. In fact, it used to be seven men.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once it consecrated the dead. Now it desecrates them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blaze deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Bogardan Firefiend dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The next one who tells me to relax and curl up by a fire is dead." - Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Bogardan Rager enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the erupting heart of Bogardan, it's hard to tell hurtling volcanic rocks from pouncing volcanic beasts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to them. If no one does, target player draws three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even the threat of power has power." - Jeska, warrior adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Cinder Elemental: It deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their rage can grow to such proportions that they explode in a cloud of fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to any target, 2 damage to another target, and 3 damage to a third target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Flamekin Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elemental card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim." - Sisay, captain of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The furnace awaits the next master who would stoke the fires of apocalypse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all creatures and gain control of them until end of turn. They gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Maybe they wanted to be on the winning side for once." - Matoc, lavamancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Echo {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Keldon Champion enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, haste When Menacing Ogre enters the battlefield, each player secretly chooses a number. Then those numbers are revealed. Each player with the highest number loses that much life. If you are one of those players, put two +1/+1 counters on Menacing Ogre.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who says lightning never strikes twice?" - Storm shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mercy? Mercy is for the playground, not the battleground."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Rockslide Elemental.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Jund, even the landscape is a deadly hunter. Volcanoes, tar pits, and rock slides seem to prey upon the living.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the Predator. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the smoldering ashes of Shiv, a few dragons strive to rebuild their native land. The rest seek any opportunity to restore the broken pride of their race.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Elemental spells or activate abilities of Elementals.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be silent and listen to your inner fire. Only then can you walk the Path of Flame."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of a waterfall. The fury of an avalanche. The intellect of a gale-force wind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Surely we could tame something besides hurdas and pillarfield oxen!" - Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Briarhorn enters the battlefield, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Torching Krosa would be pointless. It grows faster than it burns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ivy Elemental enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the gardens of the centaurs, many travelers have mysteriously vanished while admiring the elaborate topiaries.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Living Hive deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In its center is a single red ant, a queen that regulates the hive's movements.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Suspend 2 - {G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Silverglade Elemental enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tornado Elemental enters the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to each creature with flying. You may have Tornado Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get +X/+X until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kamahl left the violence of his former life behind him, but he still believes in the power of muscle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Left to itself, nature overflows any container, overthrows any restriction, and overreaches any boundary.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Boros Legion attacks, swiftblades enter the fray first. They pick off the archers and mages, softening the enemy front before the flame-kin and giants go in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature with flying. • Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lightning lives in everything, in living flesh and growing things. It must be set free." - Rakka Mar

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It holds motionless vigil, watching Naya in silence through the screen of the whitecover. When it senses anything amiss, it launches forward with the uncanny sound of torn fog.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next X damage that would be dealt to target creature, planeswalker, or player this turn is dealt to another target creature, planeswalker, or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sisay discovered that the mirrored hull of the Weatherlight could be used as a defensive weapon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The unit of measurement used to chart a cerodon's growth is "persons consumed."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste. Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0. As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get +0/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their hopes dashed on our shields! Their victory slashed by our swords!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Destroy target artifact and target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Crovax knows we're coming now," said a grinning Sisay. "I just sent the Predator crashing into his stronghold."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever equipped creature attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to the player or planeswalker it's attacking. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the wielder is strong enough, any sword will do." - Kresh the Bloodbraided

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance, haste {T}: The next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn is dealt to another target creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her sword burns with such brightness that foes avert their eyes and arrows divert their paths.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, Rumbling Slum deals 1 damage to each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov contract the Izzet to animate slum districts and banish them to the wastes. The Gruul adopt them and send them back to the city for vengeance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Frozen, we watched the funnel pluck up three of the goats - pook! pook! pook! - before we ran for the wadi." - Travelogue of Najat

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another artifact you control enters or leaves the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Underneath the cities of Esper are cycles of life unseen by those who feed them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield, you may reveal any number of other artifact cards from your hand. Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each card revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other red creatures you control get +1/+1. Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a red spell, Balefire Liege deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. Whenever you cast a white spell, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell that's both red and white, Battlegate Mimic has base power and toughness 4/2 until end of turn and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mimics don't need perfect disguises. They need only the perfect victims: the naive, the young, or the poor of sight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. {1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Mountains, you may destroy target artifact. When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Plains, you may destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hobgoblins are best left alone. They sharpen their farm implements far more than is necessary for their work in the fields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Arcbound Crusher. Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Arcbound Slith deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size - a weight of strength and of pride." - Agrus Kos

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample {3}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Bosh, Iron Golem deals damage equal to the sacrificed artifact's mana value to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Glissa searches for the truth about Memnarch, Bosh searches to unearth the secrets of his past.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves thought of the myr as minor threats, just as the myr thought of the elves.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Artifacts you control have indestructible. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them. Artifact creatures with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Did it have this shape upon Mirrodin's creation, or did some inconceivable force shape the unshapable?" - Pontifex, elder researcher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Door to Nothingness enters the battlefield tapped. {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Door to Nothingness: Target player loses the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All memory of your existence will be wiped from reality. You will die, and no one will mourn." - Memnarch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) {1}, Remove four +1/+1 counters from Etched Oracle: Target player draws three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The leonin thought of the myr as omens, never imagining the sinister fate they foretold.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins didn't think of the myr at all, which allowed the myr to observe everywhere unhindered.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Moriok saw the myr as fellow scavengers, never knowing just who the myr were scavenging for.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Tap an untapped artifact you control: Lodestone Myr gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When necessary, myr can override and control any artificial object, as can their creator.

property.value: {2}, {T}: Create a 0/1 colorless Pest artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All Auriok children know the tale, "Bolgri and the Long Day of Squashing."

property.value: {T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard. {1}, Exile Relic of Progenitus: Exile all graveyards. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elves believe the hydra-god Progenitus sleeps beneath Naya, feeding on forgotten magics.

property.value: Whenever Serum Tank or another artifact enters the battlefield, put a charge counter on Serum Tank. {3}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Serum Tank: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken saw the myr as toys, unaware of the intelligence lurking behind their empty eyes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T} or {B}, {T}: Return target artifact creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Metal permeates the marrow of every bone in Mephidross - except one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)

property.value: As the fifth sun joins the other four, new abilities awaken in the creatures of Mirrodin.

property.value: Deep within the Cabal's vault, the Mirari pulsed like a dead sun - and its darkness radiated across Otaria.
